Package com.bitsavior.entity

Class AntiBug

java.lang.Object
com.bitsavior.entity.Entity
com.bitsavior.entity.MovingEntity
com.bitsavior.entity.AntiBug
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICollision
public class AntiBug
extends MovingEntity
represents a helping bug that has a light attached and random movement
